questions.explanation:
Sheldon Cooper.

	Played by the hilarious, uber-talented Jim Parsons.

Leonard Hofstadter.

	Played by the cute, sarcastic, and funny Johnny Galecki.

waitressing.

	Penny was a waitress at the Cheesecake Factory (a real restaurant chain) before she became a prescription drug salesperson. She wore a low-cut, puffed-sleeved, white blouse under a deep yellow knit vest with a dark green apron and a denim skirt.

engineering.

	Howard is one of the only characters on the show who doesn't have a PhD. He is played by the hilarious Mr. Helberg (Simon).

questions.text: Burn gnaw debt raw stint cows key?
questions.explanation:
Bernadette Rostenkowski.

	Howard's wife has a PhD in microbiology. She's tiny but fierce sometimes. The sweet, petite, adorable, and talented Melissa Rauch plays Bernadette. This quiz author met her once at a BBT taping in Burbank.

Amy Farrah Fowler.

	Sheldon's girlfriend has a PhD in neuro-biology. I LOVED the tiara episode. In case you aren't up to date on your episodes, I won't tell you what happens regarding Amy and Sheldon.

astrophysics.

	Rajesh Koothrappali is played as delightfully metro-sexual by the handsome, funny, and charming Kunal Nayyar.

Leslie Winkle.

	Played by Sara Gilbert, Dr. Leslie Winkle is yet another physicist at Cal Tech who has slept with both Leonard and Howard.

Barry Kripke.

	Dr. Barry Kripke is also a Cal Tech physicist. He has a speech impediment similar to that of Elmer Fudd.

Gablehauser.

	Dr. Eric Gablehauser is the head of the Physics Department at Cal Tech. He is Sheldon's, Leonard's, and Raj's boss. Actor Mark Harelik plays this minor character.
